Package com.amonson.factory

Class FactoryGeneric<Interface>

java.lang.Object
com.amonson.factory.FactoryGeneric<Interface>
Direct Known Subclasses:
DataAccessLayerFactory
public class FactoryGeneric<Interface> extends Object
A generic class for creating factories for a Interface type.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public final Interface getInstance(String instanceName, Properties properties) throws FactoryException
      Create an instance of an Interface implementation.
      Parameters:
      instanceName - The name associated with the class to create.
      properties - The Properties that may contain parameters for the instance constructor.
      Returns:
      The constructed instance.
      Throws:
      FactoryException - if the class is not registered or cannot be constructed.

    • getSingletonInstance

      public final Interface getSingletonInstance(String instanceName, Properties properties) throws FactoryException
      Create an singleton instance of an Interface implementation.
      Parameters:
      instanceName - The name associated with the class to create or return.
      properties - The Properties that may contain parameters for the instance constructor when called.
      Returns:
      The constructed instance or the previously create instance.
      Throws:
      FactoryException - if the class is not registered or cannot be constructed.

    • registerClass

      public final boolean registerClass(String instanceName, Class<? extends Interface> classType)
      Register a class with the factory.
      Parameters:
      instanceName - The name to associate with the class type.
      classType - The class to create when specified by the above instanceName.
      Returns:
      true if added, false otherwise.

    • unregisterClass

      public final boolean unregisterClass(String instanceName, Class<? extends Interface> classType)
      Unregister a class with the factory.
      Parameters:
      instanceName - The name associated with the class type.
      classType - The class associated with the above instanceName.
      Returns:
      true if removed, false otherwise.
